body_html: The images will likely never get uploaded to GitHub. The best solution, which does not have a timeline, would be to replace the image links in the GitHub mark down to point to tensorflow.org. It might be more work than you want to do, but you could try to script it yourself. Putting the images in GitHub bloats the repo, or so I am told. Image links should never break over a line due to internal style guides, so a simple find replace might cover a large percent of the situation. Our publishing process is a big convoluted due to a desire to accept community contributions.
